description: This file contains a test case class for self-testing image type dependency handling in a Yocto/OpenEmbedded build system. It defines a test method that manipulates recipe files and verifies dependency generation using bitbake commands.

classes.name: ImageTypeDepTests
classes.description: A test case class for verifying image type dependencies in the build system.

methods.name: test_conversion_typedep_added(self)
methods.description: Tests that specifying IMAGE_TYPEDEP results in the appropriate dependency being added, verifies dependency presence in bitbake output and dependency graph.
